I spent $150 to get my phone fixed and get all of my photos and messages rebooted. I have had phone problems ever since, my battery is constantly drained my phone is full of viruses and it has now used my phone number and texted all of my family and friends Messages from me based as trump as if they signed up for it. I‚Äôm not even typing this on my phone because it‚Äôs completely ruined now my iCloud has been hacked and none of my apps will even open. This app is terrible!

attributes.review: My phone was fine before this app but after I downloaded it, all of my contacts started to get random texts telling them not only to download this app, but to send all they own to gina. It then caused my phone to morph into a cockroach human morph and take my dogs on walks. The cockroach then cleaned the entire house but somehow everything ended up on the ceiling. I tried deleting the app but the cockroach began following me around and peeing everywhere. The app then downloaded itself onto my computer and my iPad as well as started playing all of Donald trumps speeches while the cockroach peed in my corner. Because of this app, my phone is now a cockroach who stares at me from the corner of my room. The app developers might want to fix this bug in the app. Horrible!
attributes.title: Stole all my information

attributes.review: How unbelievable. When I downloaded this app, I expected nothing less than my racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and bigotry personality traits to be treated with respect. After I downloaded this, however, I was recommended other apps that show me facts backed by professionals in their field of expertise that disprove my beliefs, and some that even denounce the idea that Trump is anything but the perfect embodiment of what a democratic presidency should be. All He (yes with a capital H) should have to see is perfect submission from those who call themselves Americans. How is my great, holy, and perfect president supposed to lead us with other people telling me this app only gratified my negative and degrading behaviors? I‚Äôm in disbelief. One day, I pray, that this will be the only app available to the great people of this amazing and perfect nation.
attributes.title: Unbelievable
